DOC.brief_summary: This study compare clinical efficacy safety Volulyte® Voluven® elective open-heart surgery pediatric patient .
DOC.brief_title: Colloids Pediatric Cardiac Surgery : Comparison Between Balanced Non-balanced Colloid
DOC.criteria: Age 28 day 3 year old Planned cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass sign informed consent Moribund patient ( ASA 5 ) Jehovah Witnesses Preoperative coagulation disorder Preoperative renal insufficiency Preoperative hepatic disorder Intracranial hemorrhage hypernatremia
